verses.name: Luke 9:43
verses.text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God. But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did, he said unto his disciples,

verses.name: Luke 9:44
verses.text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears: for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men.

verses.name: Luke 9:45
verses.text: But they understood not this saying, and it was hid from them, that they perceived it not: and they feared to ask him of that saying.

verses.name: Luke 9:46
verses.text: Then there arose a reasoning among them, which of them should be greatest.
